Parameters

name string

Properties

CurrentAmplitudes

Current amplitude of stereo channels where 1 is full volume and 0 is silent. LeftChannel and RightChannel represent the maximum current amplitude of all of the left and right channels respectively. The most recent values are returned. Synchronisation between channels should not be expected.

public virtual ChannelAmplitudes CurrentAmplitudes { get; }

Property Value

ChannelAmplitudes

IsAlive

When false, this component has completed all processing and is ready to be removed from its parent.

public override bool IsAlive { get; }

bool

Play()

Starts or resumes playback. Has no effect if this ISampleChannel is already playing.

public virtual void Play()

Stop()

Stops playback.

public virtual void Stop()

UpdateState()

Run each loop of the audio thread's execution after queued actions are completed to allow components to perform any additional operations.
